manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: From The Manufacturer Biotique Bio Papaya Visibly Flawless Skin Face Wash Description: This fresh foaming gel is blended with pure papaya fruit to dissolve dead surface cells, unclog pore openings and smooth the way for clear skin to surface. Gentle refining action uncovers skin's natural brightness for a younger-looking complexion. Ingredients: Papita (carica papaya), akhrot chhal (juglans regia), neem (melia azadirachta indica), banhaldi (curcuma aromatica), ritha (sapindus mukorossi), kikar gaund (acacia arabica), ground nut oil, purified himalayan water Q.S. Papaya is a luscious tropical fruit known for its rejuvenating and healing benefits. Full of vitamins, minerals and phytochemicals, papaya can act as a youth activator and natural exfoliator to revitalize skin without inflammation or irritation. How to Use: Gently massage over wet face and neck with fingertips, lather and rinse, morning and evening

Main Ingredients PAPAYA(PAPITA) Papaya is a luscious tropical fruit known for its rejuvenating and healing benefits. Full of vitamins, minerals and phytochemicals, papaya can act as a youth activator and natural exfoliator to revitalize skin without inflammation or irritation.

About The Brand BIRTH OF THE BRAND 1992: The year that Biotique began Vinita Jain began her lifelong quest to advance the wisdom of her holistic legacy for all to live and thrive on. The Himalayan Masters lived in the caves on Vinita Jain’s family’s estates, where she learned to read Sanskrit and studied the ancient Ayurveda texts. The recipes for youth & longevity were of particular interest to her. Vinita Jain studied bio-technology in Switzerland and used her immense knowledge and interest in bio-science to start Biotique-- a new age of potent organic beauty. She is the visionary who introduced modern Swiss bio-technology to 5000 year old wisdom, featuring the best of the East and West with authentic, 100% vegetarian, Ayurveda skin care, hair care and wellness products. Biotique products are synonymous with serious skin and hair care developed from Ayurveda, the principal medical tradition in India for over 5000 years. OUR MISSION A passion for quality and sustainability. The promise of naturally-derived Ayurvedic beauty, advanced by scientific expertise. Our mission is to satisfy the diverse beauty needs of customers and cultures who seek natural beauty products that are as effective as they are environmentally responsible. Today, Biotique personifies the ultimate in authentic Indian traditional medicine, advanced by cutting edge Swiss biotechnology—a beauty legacy built on product purity, sustainability, universality, pioneering research, development and manufacturing for over 25 years. Biotique treatments do not cover up problems—they eliminate them. With 100% natural botanicals. No chemicals. No preservatives. No animal testing and recyclable packaging. Dermatologist Tested For Safety. CULTIVATING EXCELLENCE Biotique products are made of 100% organically-pure, preservative-free ingredients and renewable resources—cultivated, gathered, blended and manufactured in the foothills of the Himalayas. At Biotique, hybrid plant and plant extracts are combined with biotechnology to produce highly effective products. We have a special cold extraction process that preserves the active ingredient of the plant so that the intelligence of the plant can interact with the intelligence of the body to promote health and beauty. Formulated from organically grown pure plant extracts. Our products are designed, manufactured and packed by qualified Ayurveda Doctors, Swiss Cosmetologists and Dermatologists. All Ayurvedic Doctors are practitioners in various fields of natural medicine and health care.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective 👌
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good face wash. The thickness of this face wash/scrub is just good enough to smooth all over the face and give a gentle rub to remove all the dirt and impurities.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the product but hate the smell
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser is very good but it smells like cheap perfume. Get rid of the scent and you'll have an excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My face broke out in a bad rash and now I have black scars I am working on clearing up. I've used papaya products before, so I don't know what ingredient caused the rash. Just be careful and ensure you read ingredients.
Am using this product since last 2 years..and this is my forever face wash.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Gentle and Effective Cleanser for All Skin Types
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Gentle and non-irritating Effective at removing makeup and impurities Leaves skin feeling soft and hydrated Contains natural ingredients AffordableCons: The scent can be a bit strong for some people Not as effective at removing oil as some other cleansersOverall:Biotique Honey Gel Soothe & Nourish Foaming Face Wash is a gentle and effective cleanser that is suitable for all skin types. It is made with natural ingredients, such as honey, turmeric, and arjun bark, which help to cleanse the skin and leave it feeling soft and hydrated. The cleanser is also affordable, making it a great option for budget-minded consumers.Here are some specific things I liked about the cleanser: It is gentle and non-irritating. I have sensitive skin, and I found this cleanser to be very gentle. It did not cause any irritation or dryness. It is effective at removing makeup and impurities. This cleanser did a great job of removing makeup and impurities from my skin. My skin felt clean and refreshed after using it. It leaves skin feeling soft and hydrated. This cleanser left my skin feeling soft and hydrated. I did not need to use a moisturizer after using it. It contains natural ingredients. I like that this cleanser contains natural ingredients. These ingredients are good for the skin and help to keep it healthy. It is affordable. This cleanser is very affordable, making it a great option for budget-minded consumers.Here are some specific things I didn't like about the cleanser: The scent can be a bit strong for some people. The cleanser has a strong honey scent, which can be a bit strong for some people. Not as effective at removing oil as some other cleansers. This cleanser is not as effective at removing oil as some other cleansers. If you have oily skin, you may want to use a different cleanser.Overall, I would recommend Biotique Honey Gel Soothe & Nourish Foaming Face Wash to anyone who is looking for a gentle and effective cleanser for all skin types. It is made with natural ingredients, is affordable, and leaves skin feeling soft and hydrated. However, if you have oily skin, you may want to use a different cleanser.I hope this helps!
It's very good product as such a price gives you a smooth n plumpy skin. I have completely switched from expensive face washes to this one
Not suiting my dry skinMakes my skin more dry
